text: The 1995 Croatia Open Umag was a tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts in Umag, Croatia that was part of the World Series of the 1995 ATP Tour. The tournament was held from August 21 through August 28, 1995. ==Champions== ===Singles=== Thomas Muster defeated Carlos Costa, 3-6, 7-6(7-5), 6-4 *It was Muster's 10th title of the year and the 34th of his career. ===Doubles=== Luis Lobo / Javier Sánchez defeated David Ekerot / László Markovits, 6–4, 6–0 *It was Lobo's 2nd title of the year and the 3rd of his career. It was Sanchez's 2nd title of the year and the 22nd of his career. ==External links== * Singles Draw * Doubles Draw Croatia Open Umag Category:Croatia Open
title: 1995 Croatia Open Umag
